page.title: 12Adult's day at Brookmans Pk
page.content: I am the headteacher at Brookmans Park Primary School.The majority of the children come from the village itself and number about 250. I am up at 6.30a.m. as I like to have an unhurried breakfast with my wife.My yougest daughter who is 18 works in London and leaves the house to catch the train at about 7.30a.m. I leave at about 8a.m. and my journey takes only about 10 minutes by car. My wife leaves for work in north London at about the same time. As there is no convenient public transport we have to have two cars so this is a very expen- sive item in our budget. Much of my day seems to involve dealing with problems which are peripheral to education.i.e. contract cleaning:school meals:building maint- enance.I usually get home about 5.45p.m. and do some gardening or DIY.
